snippet: A federal health report issues the first solid numbers on the extent of the problem.
abstract: Editorial highlights warning issued by Centers for Disease Control and Prevention of the 'potentially catastrophic consequences' unless prompt action is taken to address antibiotic-resistant bacteria; notes that CDC report blames overuse of antibiotics in medicine and agriculture.
lead_paragraph: A federal health report issues the first solid numbers on the extent of the problem.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
